$ ick run --patch
-> i_have_no_tests: OK
-> move_isort_cfg: NEEDS_WORK

+++ b/isort.cfg
@@ -1,3 +0,0 @@
-[settings]
-line_length = 88

+++ b/pyproject.toml

+line_length = "88"
